author: Nova
title: Kerem cada vez se siente más cómodo junto a Ikra
text: ¿Se está enamorando? Kerem cada vez se siente más cómodo junto a Ikra Los Karadag vuelven a estar en medio de un grave problema con la hospitalización de Alpay. Ikra es una buena compañía para Kerem en estos momentos Publicidad Alpay está en el hospital y se debate entre la vida y la muerte después de la soberbia paliza que Halil le ha propinado. El hijo de los Sirham ha sido detenido y podría ser condenado a prisión si Alpay muere. La tensión en la casa de los Karadag es máxima. Por un lado, les duele la situación de Alpay, pero por otro saben que se lo tenía merecido y que Halil no ha tenido otra manera de responder. Sea como fuera, las cosas comienzan a mejorar cuando los médicos anuncian que Alpay ha superado las horas más difíciles y saldrá adelante. Es una alegría para todos, porque eso significa que la posible condena para Halil será menor que si Alpay hubiera muerto. Pero ahora el objetivo de los Karadag es intentar conseguir que Alpay no denuncie a Halil y, de esa manera, evitar el juicio y la posterior condena. Kerem está muy nervioso porque es consciente de la gravedad de los hechos a los que se enfrenta Halil y sabe que su padre Alpay hará todo lo posible porque le caigan la mayor cantidad de años. Quiere acudir a hablar con él. Es entonces cuando aparece Ikra. Ella le aconseja y le calma. Asegura que tiene que hablar con su padre de buenas maneras para así lograr que su corazón se ablande. Kerem sigue sus consejos y su conversación con Alpay es muy positiva. A la vuelta a la mansión, Kerem reconoce que sin los consejos de Ikra su conversación con Alpay hubiera seguido caminos muy diferentes. Kerem comienza a darse cuenta de que Ikra es una mujer muy especial y que le ayuda mucho estar junto a ella. Publicidad

author: NewsBreak Original
title: It's always 95 degrees somewhere in Grand Rapids
text:
By Julie Dunmire ,
3 hours ago If you're anything like FOX 17 news reporter Julie Dunmire, you hate the cold.
Today she took a trip to a place that is always warm in West Michigan: Funky Buddha Yoga Hothouse.
“It’s always warm in there. It’s 95 degrees. You get a little bit of summer with you,” Larissa Link, director of Funky Buddha, said.
Vibes inside the yoga studio were high on Thursday.
“I love the physical benefits of yoga,” yogi Hannah Presler said.
Coats line the walls, and boots go unused. It's a perfectly warm place on a cold day like Thursday.
“It is cozy and warm and it’s just a safe space,” Presler said.
“Do you need some relaxing after driving out on the roads the past couple days?" FOX 17 Reporter Julie Dunmire asked.
“Yeah. Oh, yeah. After yesterday, I was questioning if I was going to make it home. But I did,” yogi Emily Karbutowski answered with a chuckle.
At the movie theater, people also spent time warming up. Whether it was to go see Wicked or Moana 2 .
“Why come to the movies when it’s freezing cold out and the roads are bad and you don’t want to be outside?” Julie Dunmire asked.
“To escape reality that it’s freezing cold out,” moviegoer Mary Sue VanDyke answered through laughter.
“It’s cozy and warm and just fun, a fun thing to do, when you can’t do so much outside,” moviegoer Betty Grit said.
While it's cold, your attitude doesn't have to be. Attitudes were certainly warm at Funky Buddha.
“It’s nice to be able to come in from the outdoors, enjoy the winter. I really want to encourage that. Put on a coat. Take a walk. But then come back in here and warm yourself up. It can be such a nice way to give yourself some resourcing,” Larissa Link said.
“It kind of makes me feel like it’s summer again. It kind of makes me feel a little more happy,” Emily Karbutowski said.
Funky Buddah offers daily free meditation every morning at 7:30 a.m. as part of their efforts to be accessible for the whole community.
Follow FOX 17: Facebook - X (formerly Twitter) - Instagram - YouTube

author: Pablo Sánchez
title: Crean polémico nacimiento dentro de Oxxo y encanta a clientes
text:
Este fue el nacimiento dentro de un Oxxo que cautivo a los internautas y clientes. Según BI, al menos el 15 por ciento de marcas piensan que sus ventas incrementarán por el marketing estacional. Las marcas tratan adecuarse a la temporada con temáticas preestablecidas. En un video se mostró un curioso nacimiento dentro de un Oxxo , lo que desató una serie de señalizaciones, cuestión que cautivó a las personas, ya que para algunos consumidores esto no era una buena representación, pero, por otro lado, enamoró a los espectadores.
En un video que circula en la plataforma de TikTok, se mostró el momento en el que un hombre se encontraba afuera de un Oxxo, por lo que se percató de algo especial, ya que los empleados del lugar habrían decorado con unas botellas de refresco .
Las imágenes exhibieron el nacimiento recreado por unas botellas de Coca-Cola , las cuales estaban formadas como los personajes bíblicos, por lo que llamó la atención de las personas por este tipo de acción inesperada en cualquier caso.
Dentro de las imágenes se pudo ver como se encontraban debajo de un árbol de Navidad , por lo que la situación si bien fue polémica para algunos, para otros lo tomaron como algo gracioso e incluso divertida.
Entre otros comentarios, algunos señalizaron que presuntamente la marca de Pepsi representaría al “diablo” en este nacimiento, por lo que entre bromas se pudo mostrar que los usuarios continuaron el juego .
El apego a las marcas, se pudo encontrar como algo especial , puesto que, por una parte, se pudo encontrar la representación por parte de los consumidores desde distintos ángulos que se pueden observar.
@elvisnoelvis En este Oxxo hay un nacimiento con botellas de CocaCola y fotos de los empleados del mes. ♬ sonido original – elvisnoelvis
Marketing Estacional En el dinámico mundo del comercio, las marcas no permanecen estáticas, ya que estas se adaptan, evolucionan y, sobre todo, responden a los ritmos del calendario, a lo que el tipo de marketing estacional hace que al menos el 15 por ciento de marcas considere un incremento en sus ventas, según Business Insider.
El marketing estacional, una estrategia que consiste en alinear las campañas publicitarias con las diferentes épocas del año, se ha convertido en una herramienta fundamental para conectar con los consumidores y maximizar las ventas.
“No habrá tráiler”: empresa explota por todas las teorías de GTA VI Desde la Navidad hasta la búsqueda de escapadas en verano, pasando por el romanticismo de San Valentín o el regreso a clases en otoño, cada temporada trae consigo cambios en los hábitos de consumo y en las necesidades de los clientes.
Las marcas que logran sintonizar con estas temporadas pueden incluso invertir entre en un 8 al 12 por ciento de presupuesto anual para compaginar con este tipo de estrategias, según Deloitte, a lo que tienen más posibilidades de tener reconocimiento por parte de los consumidores.
Marinela Un ejemplo de esto se puede mostrar con marcas como Marinela, quien cada que llega Navidad transforma sus pastelitos Pinguinos en un sabor diferente cada temporada, por ejemplo, en este año se buscó el sabor dulce de leche para conquistar los paladares, mientras que en otros años se pudo encontrar como algo distinto.
Lee también:

author: Mike Roe
title: George Clooney Defends Wife Amal’s Work on Warrants Against Israel’s Leaders in White House Call
text: After President Joe Biden criticized the International Criminal Court for seeking warrants against Israeli leaders for war crimes, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, George Clooney fired back in defense of his wife’s work on the effort, according to a report by the Washington Post . Amal Clooney, an international human rights lawyer, consulted on the case for the ICC. The A-list actor called top Biden aide Steve Ricchetti to complain about Biden’s criticism of the ICC taking action against Israeli leaders Netanyahu and Defense Minister Yoav Gallant for war crimes and crimes against humanity, according to the Post, citing three anonymous sources familiar with the conversation. Clooney took issue in particular with Biden calling the move by the ICC “outrageous,” as well as Biden’s administration expressing openness to imposing sanctions on the ICC. Clooney’s wife could be subject to those penalties if the U.S. were to seek sanctions against the ICC, according to the Post’s sources, though the administration downplayed the idea that they’d considered sanctions. The ICC’s chief prosector at the same time as its move against Israel’s leaders that it was also seeking to charge Hamas leaders Yehiya Sinwar and two other top leaders of the terrorist group. The actor himself is scheduled to appear at a Biden campaign fundraiser next Saturday in Los Angeles. While the Post reported that some officials expressed concerns that Clooney could withdraw from the fundraiser, Clooney still plans to attend and the Biden campaign has disputed the idea of there being any serious worries about Clooney dropping out. The star-studded fundraiser is also set to feature Barack Obama, Jimmy Kimmel and frequent Clooney costar Julia Roberts. A representative for George Clooney did not immediately reply to TheWrap’s request for comment. In 2020, Clooney donated more than $500,000 to the Biden campaign and cohosted a pandemic-era virtual fundraiser that raised $7 million. Biden’s criticism of the ICC charges included that it suggests a false symmetry between Israel and Hamas. Amal Clooney previously said in a statement released by the Clooney Foundation for Justice that the ICC prosecutor’s office had sought her help with the investigation and asked her to review evidence of suspected war crimes. The foundation, started by Amal and George, stated that the legal team’s findings were “unanimous.”

author: DHNS
title: Creepy crawlies more a boon than bane in ICAR-NBAIR
text:
Bengaluru: The National Bureau of Agricultural Insects Resources (NBAIR), under the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), has discovered 63 new insect species in 2023-2024, boosting scientific understanding of agriculturally important insects.

.

ICAR-NBAIR also effectively managed the invasive cassava mealybug, which affected tapioca yield, by introducing the parasitoid Anagyrus lopezi, which helped restore yields to normal levels (20-25 tonnes/ha) in affected regions.

.

Additional biological control agents were released across various areas, greatly reducing the impact of pests. ICAR-NBAIR also helped in managing mango soft scale insect that had affected crops in Bengaluru and Hosur.

.

In 2023-2024, ICAR-NBAIR was granted five patents, including two in nanomaterial development for managing pests. Additionally, ICAR-NBAIR commercialised 47 technologies, including microbial pesticides, pheromones and insecticidal formulations. These technologies generated Rs 3.25 crore in revenue.

.Bengaluru-based ICAR-NBAIR discovers 63 new insect species.

ICAR-NBAIR also achieved groundbreaking progress in gene silencing technology, which resulted in up to 85-89 per cent mortality in cotton whitefly. They also developed nanotechnology for controlled release of pheromones, drone technology for delivering biocontrol agents and nanosensors for early pest detection.

.

SN Sushil, director of ICAR-NBAIR, said, during a press conference here recently, "Farmers' reliance on chemical pesticides is very high. Our aim is to use bio-pesticides, which are chemical-free and sustainable to manage pests. We have 137 live cultures of insects on our campus, which is probably the largest in the world. We also store 3.4 lakh insect specimen. We also barcode the DNA of insects and keep it in our database."

author: PRUnderground
title: Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning Earns Home Hero Award: National Real Estate Network Recognizes Excellence in Home Services | User | theeveningleader.com
text:
Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning appreciates the validation of their hard work and dedication to the home service industry
(PRUnderground) February 29th, 2024
Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning, a leading specialist in professional clothes dryer maintenance and service in Raleigh, is excited to announce their recent receipt of the prestigious Home Hero Award from the National Real Estate Network. This significant honor underscores Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s unwavering dedication to excellence within the home service sector and their esteemed reputation among real estate professionals and property managers.
The Home Hero Award, bestowed by the National Real Estate Network, recognizes companies that exhibit exceptional expertise and dependability in their respective fields. Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning has been singled out for this esteemed recognition due to their outstanding track record in delivering high-quality dryer vent cleaning services and their unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction.
“We are deeply grateful to be granted the Home Hero Award from the National Real Estate Network,” expressed a spokesperson for Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning. “This acknowledgment serves as a testament to our team’s tireless efforts and unwavering dedication to delivering exceptional service to our valued customers in Raleigh and its environs. We are honored to be regarded as a dependable service provider within the real estate industry.”
Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning is renowned for their proficiency in a wide range of dryer vent services, including cleaning, repair, and new installations, all executed with precision using top-of-the-line materials to ensure optimal safety and efficiency for both residential and commercial clients. Their team of skilled professionals employs cutting-edge equipment and methodologies to eliminate lint, debris, and potential fire hazards from dryer vents, thus promoting fire prevention and energy efficiency.
The receipt of the Home Hero Award further solidifies Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s position as a trusted and reputable service provider in the real estate realm. As a result of this distinguished recognition, they will be recommended to members of the National Real Estate Network, thereby broadening their outreach and potential client base.
Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s attainment of Home Hero Award Status underscores their unwavering commitment to excellence and their steadfast dedication to upholding the highest industry standards. They remain steadfast in their mission to serve the Raleigh community and fulfill the needs of their clientele with unparalleled professionalism and integrity.
For more information about Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning and their professional dryer vent services, please contact them at (984) 230-4060 or visit their website at https://rydersdryerventcleaningraleigh.blogspot.com/ . Find them at https://maps.app.goo.gl/WTyvUPhrHEbJnGzg7
About National Real Estate Network
National Real Estate Investors Network is proud to host real estate investing events for beginners as well as seasoned investors in various areas of the industry, including Wholesaling Real Estate, Find, Fix, & Flip, Landlording and Commercial Real Estate. They offer mentoring through several platforms including Facebook Live, YouTube Videos, Webinars and more. In addition, this is a great group for getting referrals to various reputable companies who support the industry, including real estate agents, title companies, insurance providers, attorneys, rehab contractors and home service providers. Visit to learn more about this Real Estate Network of Professionals at https://www.meetup.com/27monthlymeetup-com/

author: Lauren Miller
title: Flooding in Ditches on County Roads Spark Concern with Accomack County Residents | Latest News | wboc.com
text:
ONANCOCK, VA. - As an incoming storm looms, residents of Accomack County are bracing for potential flooding, with concerns rising over the overflow of ditches along county roads.
Residents say standing water is a common sight. Heavy rainfall often exacerbates the issue, leading to the overflow and eventually flooding. Acknowledging these community concerns, the Accomack County Board of Supervisors has announced plans to address the issue in the near future.
In Saxis, a small community within Accomack County, brown water was seen stagnating in ditches, exemplifying the potential risks posed by the impending storm. Similarly, in Parksley, homeowners describe flooding as a typical occurrence.
"Yeah, it's always flooded if we get a lot of rain, especially all at one time. It floods every single time. Both ends of the road flood," remarked Parksley resident Allison Hart.
Neighboring residents like Sherry Morgan says accumulation of trash in the ditches adds to the frustration.
"People just throw their trash in the ditches; it's like they don't care. And it's sad to see all the trash up and down the roads," said Onancock resident Sherry Morgan.
Jeff Parks, a member of the Accomack County Board of Supervisors, outlined the county's response to the drainage concerns, mentioning the suggestion of a task force.
"We're going to look at ourselves and understand what our policy is, what capabilities we have, what we have been doing, and how we can do better. The second step to that is how we can work with state partners and possibly federal partners to come up with a solution to improve drainage," explained Parks.
Parks further revealed discussions with the Virginia Department of Transportation regarding the matter. The county intends to compile a report within the next 30 days, outlining proposed solutions and then a timeline could be created addressing the issue.

author: archyde
title: Mali: Mass jailing of opponents, navy junta underneath assault from critics
text:
2024-06-27 16:21:07
Eleven Mali political opponents arrested earlier this month have been despatched to jail. They have been divided into two teams and held in a brand new jail close to Kulikoro and Bamako. Household and human rights teams referred to as the transfer a critical setback for a rustic the place the navy junta has suspended all political exercise.
They’ve been charged with assault, conspiracy towards the federal government, opposition to lawful authority and breach of public order, however haven’t but been tried. Amnesty Worldwide researcher Ousmane Diallo mentioned the arrest confirmed Malley’s violations of civil and political rights.
The NGO condemned the crackdown on opposition, the dissolution of political events and the ban on all political exercise, and criticized using drive to stop residents from expressing their opinions. In April, the navy authorities suspended all actions of political events and associations. Political events are interesting the choice, however a date for the Supreme Courtroom to overview the attraction stays unsure.
AfrikaJom Middle founder and UN professional Alyon Thien clarified that the safety disaster can solely be solved by means of respect for political pluralism somewhat than repression, including that the navy junta was pushing the nation in the direction of political impasse. In early June, a coalition of political events against the junta referred to as for protests over energy shortages and the price of residing, whereas demanding a restoration of constitutional order.
Yeri Bocoum, the one activist to report on the occasion, was kidnapped by armed males on June 8 and his household has not heard from him since. Mali’s authorities have been criticized for authoritarian governance, whereas a crackdown on dissent has drawn concern from the worldwide group and human rights defenders.
